Question.Subject: I was getting info for something and i notice something was misspelled.... can i trust this site?
Question.Content: They spelled color as "colour". Should i trust this site?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
"They spelled color as "colour". " That isn't necessarily wrong, colour is the normal spelling in British English.
"Should i trust this site?" Without more information I couldn't say. The odd misspelling wouldn't worry me hugely though. For a commercial site I consider it a huge red flag if I can't find address and telephone information readily but for a personal site this is normal.

Answer.Content:
If I didn't trust every site that had a misspelling on it, I would have to stop using the internet... after all it is people that build and maintain websites.
As to whether you can trust the site, look for a physical address, phone number, and privacy policy. If still in doubt, go somewhere else...
